dialogue.string: 1�I travel......hear lots...Hear...stories... Can tell...if...
1�Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.

1�What story would you like to be told?On second thought, maybe later.The Decisive Heroine(pt.1).The Decisive Heroine(pt.2).The Decisive Heroine(pt.3).Fall from Grace.Both Paths Taken.Pretender to the Throne(pt.1).Pretender to the Throne(pt.2).Banished(pt.1).Banished(pt.2).Banished(pt.3).
1�Will you leave?Yes.No.??Buy time???

1�?You are unable to make further progress in Rhapsodies of Vana'diel due to an event occurring in the  [Chains of Promathia/Treasures of Aht Urhgan/Wings of the Goddess/Seekers of Adoulin/Rise of the Zilart] mission
1�Siren! Where is Lady Iroha!?
1�We do not intend to fold, even if Altana cannot help us!
1�All we need is light to guide us, no matter how dim that may be!
1�Siren, your understanding and compassion are beyond compare.
1�All the prime avatars can understand our words and thoughts, and will not deny us our due!
1�To think you would do such a thing for us!
1�??Fade??? Why fade?
1�? [Lord/Lady]  , it matters not what Siren says. We cannot turn back now!
1�What we seek lies further within!
1�Lady Iroha!
1�The two of us shall take Iroha somewhere where she can recuperate.
1�Here. You will have need of this.
1�This is 6???? bestowed upon us by Siren.
1�Meet with Selh'teus in our stead. Please.
1�Ah yes, the cute one. I sense you have a special bond with her.
1�Then heed well my words.
1�When I was under the ambassador's thrall, I opened up many spatial rifts...though it pains me to admit it.
1�One such rift is the location which unfolds before you now.
1�Ru'Aun is said to be a place close to the gods, so it is of no wonder he wishes to strike here.
1�A cloud of nothingness descending from a different dimension created this land, devoid of all time and color.
1�It passed through the crystal, devouring all in its wake.
1�Yet what did Altana do to stop it?6Nothing.
1�She was eminently aware of the truth.
1�This is the destiny that Vana'diel is fated to face.
1�The tide can no longer be stemmed.
1�Altana is alone, having lost her counterpart [/ in Promathia], and is wholly powerless.
1�Ah, such words encourage me to entrust what I can to you.
1�I shall show you how to meet Altana.
1�But to do so, you must first banish the Emptiness surrounding Reisenjima.
1�And the only one who can aid you in that task is Selh'teus.
1�I shall grant you the ability to traverse the mists to where Selh'teus resides.
1�Never forget your charge, even should Iroha and I fade from this world.
1�Hahaha...Your friend had bid me buy some time, yet I fear that I cannot hold out any longer.
1�That which wishes to defile the cycle of nature is using us to try to extinguish itself.
1�Pray it succeeds.
1�She has explicitly expressed that she does not desire to see you.
1�Do not get in the way. That which wishes to defile the cycle of nature is trying to extinguish itself.
1�She has explicitly expressed that she does not desire to see you.
1�That which wishes to defile the cycle of nature is trying to extinguish itself...and we will do our utmost to see that it succeeds.
1�You would do best to remain ignorant of the particulars. Now go.
1�Two? Nay, there are three.
1�Iroha, perhaps she is correct.
1�You are here in the year 884, and have already formed strong bonds with those around you.
1�If any can overcome the natural order, it is Altana Herself...and She has infused you with a bit of Her grace.
1�When this communion has been undertaken, the fate of this age will lie in the hands of those who call it home.
1�Well, if this isn't something else. Hey, Naji, get a load of this!
1�I've seen some stuff in my time, but it's wholly unnatural.
1�Don't get in over your head, my little adventurer buddy.
1�We haven't quite finished up our survey of it, but one thing's fully clear:
1�The longer you stay in this Escha place, the more your spirit slips away.
1�You couldn't pay me enough to jump into the vortex over there.
1�Have you got a better word for it?
1�You going in?
1�Suppose we can't stop you, but don't go getting yourself killed.
1�I think we all agree that's for the best.
1�As if that's not bad enough, you also lose all sense of time. That's why we make sure to keep someone posted at the entrance.
1�The chief is convinced that this is because the power of the crystals is being drained.
1�The only reason magic can be used inside is that the energies of Misareaux Coast are seeping in too.
1�Vortex?
1�(You're the dread fiend...Balamor.)
1�(A stage?)
1�(This world isn't just a playground for the gods.)
1�(This fiend is beyond all reason.)
1�( , keep him busy.)
1�(In the meantime...I'll seal off that conduit.)
1�(And what does that mean?)
1�The fool is you!
1�Though our world may stumble and falter...
1�I won't let you use it as your plaything!
h!�We did it...
1�We protected the crystals.
1�( ...bring Iroha to Al'Taieu.)
1�(I shall open the gates for you.)
1�Oh me, oh my!
1�Why would you come here to bother me? Surely I'm of no use to you now.
1�Ah, your masked friend?
1�I tied him up on the other side of the vortex.
1�You know, at first I thought he might have been a pretender, but he's really been quite...useful.
1�When I told him I sought astral forces, he up and created this lovely little swirly thing for me!
1�Not that it didn't take a little ??convincing.??
1�Him? He's over on the other side of the vortex.
1�You know, at first I thought he might have been a pretender, but he's really been quite...useful.
1�When I told him I sought astral forces, he up and created this lovely little swirly thing for me!
1�Not that it didn't take a little ??convincing.??
1�Me? Oh, I'm just gathering astral forces. No need to pay me any heed.
1�When I told your masked friend I sought them, he up and created this lovely little vortex for me!
1�Not that it didn't take a little ??convincing.??
1�Oh, Selh'teus, what a grand pleasure it is!
1�I've saved a seat in the front row just for you.
1�A bit ironic, wouldn't you say? Lest you forget, it was you who first stole energy from Tartarus.
1�And so I'm taking back what's mine--and perhaps a little more--to create the most spectacular of stages!
1�That's right. A world of my own making.
1�Vana'diel isn't the only world I've been to. This energy is a gift from the gods--to make a god!

1�The authors of these worlds all have one thing in common--they conjure up lakes and rivers, fashion sentient beings, dictate laws by which all must abide...and then one day, up and abandon their creations.
1�Let's just say I'm a bit disgusted at the chaos they've left in their wake.
1�You don't need to have traveled to different worlds to know I'm right. Look at your Vana'diel--Emptiness this, all-consuming void that--it's halfway between a tragedy and a comedy of errors!
1�??This world isn't just a playground for the gods???
1�And that's another contributing factor to how vague life is here. One man's justice is another man's evil.
1�No, my world will be much simpler. When there is only one path, no one gets lost.
1�He who seizes the power of the crystals has the right and provenance to rule!
.?�No!No no no no!No no no no no no no no!
1�You're all fools!
1�You don't think of the past or the future. Only the present. So with tit-for-tat the first thing you turn to is the sword.
1�Look toward the future--here I stand, poised to create a new world while yours is going to fall into nothingness.
1�Don't you think it's foolish to stop me?
1�But let's verbally spar a while longer, hmmm?
1�With him at my side, I could have created a world from the void!
1�If he joined with me, much like he did with Siren...
1�We would have been able to live forever! Bwehehe!
1�What's that, now? Speak up!
r.�May your forces intertwine and banish the two of us who are not supposed to be here!
1�Sir Tenzen, Master--I am not the one who fails to comprehend the meaning of my life!
1�None of you could possibly grasp the horror of the future I have seen--the future I have lived!
1�What of ?[Sir/Lady]  ? If you truly call ?[him/her] Master...
].�Jump into the vortex?Off we go!Not just yet.
1�Commence battle?Yes.No.
1�Commence battle?Yes.No.
1�Commence battle?Yes.No.
1�Commence battle?Yes.No.
1�Commence battle?Yes.No.
1�Commence battle?Yes.No.
1�Commence battle?Yes.No.
1�Commence battle?Yes.No.
1�Commence battle?Yes.No.
1�Commence battle?Yes.No.
1�Commence battle?Yes.No.
1�Commence battle?Yes.No.
1�Unreal, isn't it?
1�You ever seen anything quite like this place?
1�The name's Dremi. Yours?
1� , eh?Heh, I'll have to remember that one.
1�I'm here on behalf of the Tenshodo.
1�My job here is to brief adventurers like you on the latest details in the area, and of course, do some business while I'm at it.
1�I've got some items here you can't get anywhere else. Items you'll need if you want to survive in this place. All it takes is a bit of silt and I'm sure you and I will get along fine.
1�Why if it isn't  . What can I do for you on this beautiful sunny day?
1�Why if it isn't  . What can I do for you on this beautiful sunny day?
1�Why if it isn't  . What can I do for you on this beautiful sunny day?
1�Ah,  , thanks for stopping by!
1�I've just gotten word that a particularly unusual monster that's  �[/supposed to show up soon/been spotted nearby]. We could use your help in putting it down.
1�If you're heading out to face him, you're gonna need this if you want to be any use.
1�Why if it isn't  . What can I do for you on this beautiful sunny day?

1�What would you like to do?Nothing in particular. �[Receive elvorseal/Return elvorseal].Teleport to the target monster.Check area blessings.Receive key items.View grisly trinket notes.Receive vorseals.Return vorseals.Check vorseal effects.Receive temporary items.Hear various explanations.

1�Now before we can talk, I hope you don't mind paying the 
� silt gratuity fee. It's just company policy: no fee, no business.

1�Pay silt? (current silt: 
�)Yes. (pay 
 silt)Maybe not.
1�Huh... You really believe what people tell you, don't you? That's cute. Don't worry, with this I think we can get things done.
1�Whoa there, ?[big guy/Sweetie]! Looks like you're a little short on silt.
1�Really? Are you sure? I promise I won't bite.
1�You got it.
1�Here's a list of effects that are now active in our neck of the woods.
1�Which active blessing will you check?None of them. Go back.Temperance.Fortitude.Piety.Justice.Hope.Wisdom.Compassion.Dignity.Loyalty.Mercy.Courage.
1�Temperance: Reduces the silt cost of eschan portals.
1�Fortitude: Increases the status effects of vorseals.
1�Piety: Increases the effect duration of vorseals.
1�Justice: Increases ??Treasure Hunter?? ability by 1.
1�Hope: Increases the chances of an emblazoned reliquary appearing.
1�Wisdom: Increases the effect duration of food.
1�Compassion: Increases the ??Refresh?? and ??Regen?? effects of vorseals.
1�Dignity: Increases escha silt yields.
1�Loyalty: Increases escha beads yields.
1�Mercy: ?5???? and 5???? have a chance of not being consumed.
1�Courage: Increases the ??Rare enemy+?? effects of vorseals.
1�Teleport to the target?I'm ready.Not quite yet.
1�Glad to hear it. Show that lizard what happens when you mess with our operations.
1�Awww, afraid of the big monster? I'll be right here after you've changed your underwear. Go do what you've gotta do.
1�Here, catch.
1� �[You feel the warmth of the elvorseal's divine protection./The warmth of the elvorseal fades away.]
e.�Alter egos may be used here without any effect on enmit
1�No charge for this one, we need as many people on that thing as we can get.
1�There's a lot to go over, so I'll just answer your questions one at a time.
1�The same power that allows that elvorseal to let you affect Naga Raja physically can also teleport you directly to his location.
1�If you want a physics lesson on how it works, then too bad.
1�So, you ready to send that nagging Naga Raja our regards, cupcake?
1�What? If you're not gonna fight go ahead and say so! Here, let me have that back.
1� �[You feel the warmth of the elvorseal's divine protection./The warmth of the elvorseal fades away.]

1�Oh...I think you're gonna like this.It works just like a 3????, letting you find some of the more...elusive denizens that call this place home.
1�Unlike a 3????, however, this beauty doesn't shatter after just one use. Instead it'll keep you company for one hour, or until you choose to leave Escha.

1�The mollifier? It repels all those rarer, more unsavory creatures in the area.

l.�Obtained key item: ?3????.
1� , are you aware of special charms known as ??nazars??? There are a total of ten of them, and they can be found on various fearsome foes prowling around Escha.

1�We hadn't learned about them until recently, when I got word from one of the higher-ups about their existence. Bring me one of each and I'll be able to furnish you with an extra-special grisly trinket.
1�I figured maybe you'd have them all by now, but...turns out I was wrong. Come back once you've found all ten.
1�Ah, well done?[ lad/]! What do you say--how's about that trinket?
1�Would you like the new trinket?Of course!Not right now.
1�And there you go. Treat it well.
l.�Obtained key item: ?3????.
1�This 3???? contains with it a tiny bit of puissance from the Far East.
1�Don't go around manhandling it willy-nilly, or its energies might seep out.
